name: Break-Troops-Fast
description:
Whats the most important meal of the day? Compete with your friends to help little space aliens! Are you supporting the Loud Butter Lord or the Wise Explosive Jam? Find it out here!

BTF: Break-Troops-Fast is a strategy game that faces two teams in a battle where they must manage their troops to get to the enemy base and win the round. The winning team is decided by a best of 5 games , where the armies will have to survive a changing scenario. Use the skills of your allies to break through! The enemy is hiding ... but you will reveal their plan and make them bite the cocoa powder!
